name: NO Logic
description:
Welcome to the mind-blowing world of "Logic NO"! Get ready for exciting platform gameplay like no other. In this game, each level challenges the very concept of logic, keeps you on your toes and challenges your problem-solving skills at every turn.



Going on a trip, be prepared to give up all the usual expectations. Logic NO takes great pleasure in constantly changing the rules of the game, ensuring that no two levels are the same. Once you think you've mastered the mechanics, the game will change conditions, leaving you to wade through a maze of puzzles.

As you progress, you will encounter many confusing problems that defy common sense and previous knowledge. Adaptability and quick wits are the keys to success in this ever-changing world of NO Logic!
